caption.en: I initiated, (co-)designed, and continue to maintain this state-of-the-art, cross-platform C++ binding for the OpenGL API.
caption.de: Cross-platform C++ binding for OpenGL, solely based on the xml-based OpenGL API specification.

caption.en: A cross-platform C++ interface for OpenGL's programmable pipeline that I (co-)designed and continue to support.
caption.de: Cross-platform C++ library providing an object oriented interface for OpenGL's programmable pipeline.

caption.en: OSG library featuring dynamic, immersive, textured or date-time and location based, procedural skies.
caption.de: OSG library featuring dynamic, immersive, textured or date-time and location based, procedural skies.

caption.en: Basic test for progressive path tracing of triangle-based meshes, running on the GPU using OpenGL.
caption.de: Test test for progressive path tracing of triangle-based meshes, running on the GPU using OpenGL.

caption.en: While enjoying co-lecturing multiple Game Programming Seminars, I like editing videos to promote these rare seminars.
caption.de: While enjoying co-lecturing multiple Game Programming Seminars, I like editing videos to promote these rare seminars.

caption.en: Disseminatied conference information and redesigned the Logo and Website of the IEEE Conf. on Software Visualization.
caption.de: While enjoying co-lecturing multiple Game Programming Seminars, I like editing videos to promote these rare seminars.

caption.en: We experimented with 3d printed, colored, and labeled 2.5D treemaps by means of feasibility and interaction.
caption.de: While enjoying co-lecturing multiple Game Programming Seminars, I like editing videos to promote these rare seminars.

caption.en: In 2011 I created my first miniature 3D print of my two month old daughter as a present for her grand parents.
caption.de: 2011 habe ich meinen ersten 3D Druck gemacht: meine damals zwei Monate alte Tochter als Geschenk an ihre Gro√üeltern.
